Applicant : Gustin, Raychel
School (district) : Willow Creek Elementary  (Nampa)
Role(s) : Early Elementary Teacher (K-2nd);
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am a firm believer that children are little scientists and learn best from problem solving and playing. I hope to learn new skills to help develop these things and abilities in my children to help give them more tools to carry them through their schooling. 
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* In-Person
	* Remote
	* Hybrid

	* No specific STEM domain experience

	* Primary Email : rgustin@nsd131.org
	* Secondary Email : raychel.shaw@hotmail.com
	* Phone : 8016486517
	* Communication & Availability : Text messages
Applicant : Gustin, Raychel
School (district) : Willow Creek Elementary  (Nampa)
Role(s) : Early Elementary Teacher (K-2nd);
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am a firm believer that children are little scientists and learn best from problem solving and playing. I hope to learn new skills to help develop these things and abilities in my children to help give them more tools to carry them through their schooling. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Physics
	* Earth & Environmental Science
	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Life Science / Biology
	* Chemistry

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* K



STEM Domain Experience
	* No specific STEM domain experience

Business software & skills:
	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : Yes
Secondary Teaching : No
Adult Teaching : No
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:

	* Life Science / Biology
	* Chemistry

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* K

	* No specific STEM domain experience

	* Primary Email : rgustin@nsd131.org
	* Secondary Email : raychel.shaw@hotmail.com
	* Phone : 8016486517
	* Communication & Availability : Text messages
Applicant : Gustin, Raychel
School (district) : Willow Creek Elementary  (Nampa)
Role(s) : Early Elementary Teacher (K-2nd);
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am a firm believer that children are little scientists and learn best from problem solving and playing. I hope to learn new skills to help develop these things and abilities in my children to help give them more tools to carry them through their schooling. 
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Physics
	* Earth & Environmental Science
	* Math
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Life Science / Biology
	* Chemistry
